effect.en: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 8 cards.
effect.fr: Mélangez votre main avec votre deck. Ensuite, piochez 8 cartes.
effect.es: Pon las cartas de tu mano en tu baraja y barájalas todas. Después, roba 8 cartas.
effect.it: Rimischia le carte che hai in mano nel tuo mazzo. Poi pesca otto carte.
effect.pt: Embaralhe a sua mão no seu baralho. Em seguida, compre 8 cartas.
effect.de: Mische deine Handkarten in dein Deck. Ziehe anschließend 8 Karten.

description.en: Individually, they're incredibly weak. It's by gathering up into schools that they're able to confront opponents.
